name: Horror [REC]
description:
The “Horror Magazine” soon will show for the first time the new documentary film about the REAL paranormal events occurred in abandoned places over the county

Starring Nail Wilson, a young cameraman, you will explore the abandoned asylum in the town's outskirts

The film has to be finished for the next week, without Nail being wounded. You will use a special camera, which can receive strange energy…

Shot every you can. Good luck.

-Horror, terror and suspense for sure

-Multiple languages
